summary: Provides unit and integration tests for the Latte image generation pipeline, checking core features such as attention slicing, callback execution, batch and identical input handling, optional component serialization, and compatibility with xformers attention, as well as full end‑to‑end pipeline validation.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and performance of the Latte diffusion pipeline across different configurations and hardware setups, supporting reliable development and deployment of the image generation model.
